description: This template schema represents a generic quantitative clinical measure, either a single measurement, or the result of aggregating several measurements made over time (see descriptive statistic schema for a list of aggregate measures)

unit-value.description: The value of the quantitative measure, together with the relevant unit of measure.

effective-time-frame.description: The time frame to which the quantitative measure effectively refers.

descriptive-statistic.description: The descriptive statistic of an aggregate measure.
